lead_paragraph: Craig Anderson leaned on his stick in the hallway behind the Senators' bench and put his head down. The public address announcer said his name, and he lumbered onto the ice, tears flowing during an ovation from the other team's fans.

headline.print_headline: Sens' Anderson Gets Shutout After Wife's Cancer Diagnosis
headline.main: Sens' Anderson Gets Shutout After Wife's Cancer Diagnosis
